name: Fly Paint
description:
Here you have an airplane and a tank full
of color - fly the world colorful!

7 landscapes are waiting to be painted by you.

Your paint cannon throws drops of paint down.
Steer your plane skillfully and leave no white space! 

If you have colored a world 50 percent, the next world will be unlocked

To colorize a world, you will be take about 30 min ... take a seat, fasten seatbelts and chill down...
